attributes.action: call an immediate General Election in view of the wide spread concern about the abuse of expenses by some MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is wide spread concern about the revelations of abuse by some MP's of the expenses system. This had led to a total lack of confidence at a time when a strong Government is essential for the future of our country

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
